name: Pyroette
description:
Our submission for 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

You are a cute fireball and you want to spread your love around summer camp. 
Pick your target and hop on it to give them a hug, everyone you touch will spread the love around them.

Contols :

  • Move - Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • R - Restart
  • ESC - Quit the game

Credit : 

Thibaud GAYRAUD
Céline MARCANDELLA
Souhail ANOUAR

Music : Swamp Shuffle by Silent Partner
Sound : YouTube Music Library
3D Assets : Simple Low Poly Nature Pack (Unity Asset store)
